name.description: The name of the component that this block will use. Defaults to the key if not provided.

key.description: The name of the key that this block will be associated with.

path.description: The path to create the component.

interfaceSuffix.description: The suffix of the interface. Defaults to 'Block'

componentSuffix.description: The suffix of the component. Defaults to 'Block'

configurationPath.description: Path of the configuration that is to be used by this schematic
